Name: API Test Suite for v5 Regression - ACL

Tests.Name: Test ACL Profiles with Duplicate Names

Steps.Name: Create ACL Profile with Name: 'My ACL Profile'
Verify ACL Profile with Name: 'My ACL Profile'
Create Another ACL Profile with Name: 'My ACL Profile'

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name My ACL Profile already exists in document [aclprofiles]'

Steps.Name: Create Another ACL Profile with Name: 'my ACL Profile'

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name my ACL Profile already exists in document [aclprofiles]'

Steps.Name: Create ACL Profile with Name: 'My Other ACL Profile'
Update ACL Profile Name from: 'My Other ACL Profile' to: 'My ACL Profile'

Expected.Text: b"409 Conflict: entry with name 'My ACL Profile' already exists in document [aclprofiles]"

Tests.Name: Test ACL Profiles with Abnormal Names

Steps.Name: Create ACL Profile with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Update ACL Profile Name from: 'My Other ACL Profile' to: ''

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"
